parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.34</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Multiplayer </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns [[true]] if the [[serverCommand]] can be performed on the machine and in this exact environment, otherwise [[false]]. serverCommand can be executed only from [[User Interface Event Handlers]], and this command also checks if that's the case.
 </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[serverCommandExecutable]] command </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value>  command: [[String]] - see [[Multiplayer_Server_Commands#Commands|Multiplayer Server Commands]] for all available commands </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1 </name>=<value> <code>_canKick = [[serverCommandAvailable]] "#kick";</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2 </name>=<value> Add button to the main map to lock server, which could only be activated by admin:
<code>[[with]] [[uiNamespace]] [[do]] {
	ctrl = [[findDisplay]] 12 [[ctrlCreate]] ["RscButton", -1];
	ctrl [[ctrlSetPosition]] [0,0,0.5,0.1];
	ctrl [[ctrlCommit]] 0;
	ctrl [[ctrlSetText]] "LOCK SERVER";
	ctrl [[ctrlAddEventHandler]] ["ButtonDown",
	{	
		[[if]] ([[serverCommandExecutable]] "#lock") [[then]] {
			[[serverCommand]] "#lock";
		} [[else]] {
			[[hint]] "You need to be logged in as admin to do this";
		};
	}];
};</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[serverCommand]], [[serverCommandAvailable]], [[Multiplayer Server Commands]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>

<h3 style="display:none">Notes</h3>

<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
